original_text: Jehoiada the priest took a chest and bored a hole in its lid. He placed it beside the altar, on the right side as one enters the temple of the Lord. The priests who guarded the entrance put into the chest all the money that was brought to the temple of the Lord.
korean_text: 제사장 여호야다가 한 궤를 가져다가 그것의 뚜껑에 구멍을 뚫어 여호와의 전문 어귀 오른쪽 곧 제단 옆에 두매 여호와의 성전에 가져 오는 모든 은을 다 문을 지키는 제사장들이 그 궤에 넣더라

sentences.original_text: Jehoiada the priest took a chest
and bored a hole in its lid
He placed it beside the altar
on the right side as one enters
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 들어갈 때 오른쪽에 위치하게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: The priests who guarded the entrance
put into the chest all the money
that was brought to the temple of the Lord
